metadata.title: CVE-2022-24615 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description: zip4j up to v2.10.0 can throw various uncaught exceptions while parsing aspecially crafted ZIP file, which could result in an application crash.This could be used to mount a denial of service attack against servicesthat use zip4j library.

criterions.comment: zip4j package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
